name: italia-pagopa-ts
description: Client and server for interacting with pagoPA
author: Federico Feroldi <federico@teamdigitale.governo.it>

scripts.build: npm-run-all -s generate:yaml-from-wsdl generate:ts-from-yaml lint build:tsc && cp -r wsdl dist
scripts.generate:ts-from-yaml: rm -f lib/api/*.ts && rm -f yaml-to-ts/*.ts && gen-api-models --api-spec ./yaml-file/FespCdService.yaml --out-dir yaml-to-ts/ --ts-spec-file ./lib/api/public_api_FespCdService.ts && gen-api-models --api-spec ./yaml-file/PagamentiTelematiciPspNodoservice.yaml --out-dir yaml-to-ts/ --ts-spec-file ./lib/api/public_api_PagamentiTelematiciPspNodoservice.ts
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && rm -rf build/temp
scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist
